titles.title: To amend the National Agricultural Research, Extension, and Teaching Policy Act of 1977 to extend eligibility to junior and community colleges for grants and fellowships for food and agricultural sciences education.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E653)
Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations and Nutrition.

bill.summary: 3/16/1993--Introduced. Amends the National Agricultural Research, Extension, and Teaching Policy Act of 1977 to make junior and community colleges eligible for grants and fellowships for food and agricultural sciences education.
